titles.title: District of Columbia Legislative Autonomy Act of 2011
To amend the District of Columbia Home Rule Act to eliminate Congressional review of newly-passed District laws.
District of Columbia Legislative Autonomy Act of 2011

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform, and in addition to the Committee on Rules, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform, and in addition to the Committee on Rules, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health Care, District of Columbia, Census and the National Archives .

bill.summary: District of Columbia Legislative Autonomy Act of 2011 - Amends the District of Columbia Home Rule Act to eliminate congressional review of newly-passed District laws.
